column4: I installed Digikam and wanted to make a slide show with music. but it said that I needed mp2enc. It is not in the repositories. It is not availabe with apt. I did install ImageMagick but that did not work. Can I fix it. Or, is there another way to make a slide show with music?
install apt-file , it downloads a database of the files and packages, you can search for things with that
glxinfo | grep direct should tell you the status of your 3d
